roleset.name: schedule, designate

example.name: passive
example.text: The giant computer maker is slated [*]to offer $ 500 million [*U*] of 30-year non-callable debentures through underwriters led [*] by Salomon Brothers Inc .
example.arg: offer $ 500 million [*U*] of 30-year non-callable debentures through underwriters led [*] by Salomon Brothers Inc

example.name: with Arg0
example.text: Ford Motor Co. slated overtime again this week at its Wixom , Mich. ; Wayne , Mich. ; Kansas City , Mo. , and Norfolk , Va. , assembly plants .
example.arg: at its Wixom , Mich. ; Wayne , Mich. ; Kansas City , Mo. , and Norfolk , Va. , assembly plants

example.name: with temporal Arg2
example.text: Greece 's second bout of general elections this year is slated [*]for Nov. 5 .
example.arg: Greece 's second bout of general elections this year

roleset.note: SLATE-V NOTES: No appropriate Vncls. (from slate.01-v)
